intro: Sinosenecio globigerus var. adenophyllus, commonly known as the腺叶鼠尾草, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features slender, hairy stems and narrow, lance-shaped leaves. Its flowers are typically yellow to orange, arranged in clusters, and bloom during the summer months. It is often found in rocky or sandy soils in mountainous regions.
